flatter.translation[0].definitions[0].de: to praise someone in order to please them or get something from them, even though you do not mean it
flatter.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: Perry would always flatter Mrs. Mitchell by praising her cooking.
flatter.translation[0].definitions[1].de: to make someone look as attractive as they can
flatter.translation[0].definitions[1].ex: That dress really flatters your figure.
flatter.translation[0].definitions[2].de: to make something look or seem more important or better than it is
flatter.translation[0].definitions[2].ex: Lewis’s novel doesn’t flatter Midwestern attitudes and morals.
